body: The art on the cover and first story is some of the best I've seen.
Ohhhh,oooohhhh Emilia with Giant boobs from RE ZERO :DD
well, I thought girl at the cover is Emillia from Re;Zero
@juggenaut Santa Well somehow this is sad, that they had to suspension of publication COMIC Penguin Celeb. But glad that there will be still the othere two from COMIC Penguin.
